medical_history.chief_complaint: Slow growth in height and weight and developmental delay.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began more than two years ago, with significant developmental delay including inability to sit independently and no verbal communication. Associated feeding difficulties with preference for semi-solid and liquid foods. There were significant delays in cognitive, language, and motor development, with notable milestones like inability to sit or stand unassisted until later and abnormal irritability.
